meanings.definition: To write or draw with a pencil.
meanings.sent1: She pencilled a quick note to remind herself.
meanings.sent2: He always pencilled his ideas before sharing them.
meanings.sent3: The cat pencilled a message on the wall, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her smile pencilled joy on her face.
meanings.sent5: The artist pencilled a masterpiece on the canvas.

meanings.definition: Having markings made with a pencil.
meanings.sent1: The pencilled lines on the paper were clear.
meanings.sent2: The pencilled sketch captured the scene perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The pencilled cat drawing looked mischievous.
meanings.sent4: Her pencilled eyebrows framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The pencilled map guided them through the forest.
